d2_workflow_config.workflow_label_en: Bio Cat2 GMP Submit for Review and Approval...(eSignature)

activity.delegate_dql: select g.i_all_users_names from dm_group g, dm_user u where any g.i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_reviewers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites))) and any g.i_all_users_names NOT IN ($repeatingvalue(wf_reviewers)) and any g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 ENABLE(ROW_BASED)
activity.task_instructions_en: The attached document requires your attention to review. If you accept the document use 'Reviewed Without Comments' to move the document forward. If you do not accept the document use 'Reviewed With Comments' to send it back to Draft.

follow-up.message_en: 30 days have passed since this task was sent to you. Please review "$value(object_name)" to determine if the document should be accepted and moved forward for further approval. Please note that the document authors have been notified.
follow-up.subject_en: There is a task outstanding for the following document "$value(object_name)"

follow-up.message_en: The reviewers $value(wf_reviewers) have been notified that they have a task for the document "$value(object_name)", which has been outstanding for 30 days. If this document needs to be expedited please contact the reviewers directly.

activity.delegate_dql: select g.i_all_users_names from dm_group g, dm_user u where any g.i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_approvers' and alias_value not like '%_qo_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites))) and any g.i_all_users_names NOT IN ($repeatingvalue(wf_approvers)) and any g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 ENABLE(ROW_BASED)
activity.task_instructions_en: Please review the attached documents. After reviewing them, please move them forward by accepting the task or send them back to Draft by rejecting the task.

follow-up.message_en: 30 days have passed since this task was sent to you. Please review "$value(object_name)" to determine if the document should be accepted and moved forward for further approval. Please note that the document authors have been notified.
follow-up.subject_en: There is a task outstanding for the following document "$value(object_name)"

follow-up.message_en: The approvers $value(wf_approvers) have been notified that they have a task for the document "$value(object_name)", which has been outstanding for 30 days. If this document needs to be expedited please contact the approvers directly.

activity.delegate_dql: select g.i_all_users_names from dm_group g, dm_user u where any g.i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_approvers' and alias_value not like '%_qo_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites))) and any g.i_all_users_names NOT IN ($repeatingvalue(wf_approvers)) and any g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 ENABLE(ROW_BASED)
activity.task_instructions_en: Please review the attached documents. After reviewing them, please move them forward by accepting the task or send them back to Draft by rejecting the task.

follow-up.message_en: 30 days have passed since this task was sent to you. Please review "$value(object_name)" to determine if the document should be accepted and moved forward for further approval. Please note that the document authors have been notified.
follow-up.subject_en: There is a task outstanding for the following document "$value(object_name)"

follow-up.message_en: The approvers $value(wf_approvers) have been notified that they have a task for the document "$value(object_name)", which has been outstanding for 30 days. If this document needs to be expedited please contact the approvers directly.

activity.task_subject_en: Demote to Draft with new Version

activity.delegate_dql: select g.i_all_users_names from dm_group g, dm_user u where any g.i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_authors' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites))) and any g.i_all_users_names NOT IN ($repeatingvalue(wf_authors)) and any g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 ENABLE(ROW_BASED)
activity.task_instructions_en: Please make any necessary changes to "$value(object_name)" and 'Resend' the task to resubmit for review and/or approval.

activity.task_subject_en: Skip For Review and Send to For Approval

activity.task_instructions_en: You cannot designate yourself as the sole approver of "$value(object_name)". The document must be approved by someone other than yourself, although you can include yourself as an additional approver if required.

activity.task_subject_en: Demote to Draft with new Version
activity.value: demote to Draft and Version the Doc

activity.task_subject_en: Validate entry conditions to make Effective

activity.task_instructions_en: Please make any necessary changes to "$value(object_name)" and 'Resend' the task to resubmit for review and/or approval.

uniquenesscheck.uniqueness: Validate CTS rendition of the document is created before going to next stage of workflow.
Validate selected document is a Draft document
Validate selected document is the CURRENT version
Validate selected document is not checked-out
Validate user is an Author or Document Coordinator for the selected document
Validate selected document is not involved in an active workflow

attribute.message_failed_en: The Process List is not updated correctly. Hence document cannot be sent to the workflow.
attribute.name: wf_process_list

attribute.message_failed_en: This document is configured for approval without eSignatures. It cannot be sent on a workflow that uses eSignatures.
attribute.name: wf_signature_list

list.assistance_dql: select g.i_all_users_names from dm_user u, dm_group g where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_authors' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) AND ANY g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 order by g.i_all_users_names

select g.i_all_users_names from dm_user u, dm_group g where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_reviewers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) AND ANY g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 order by g.i_all_users_names

select g.i_all_users_names from dm_user u, dm_group g where any i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and alias_value like '%_approvers' and alias_value not like '%_qo_approvers' and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) AND ANY g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 order by g.i_all_users_names

comment.label_en: The above users are strictly for workflow purpose.
Any change here will not change the users in the process info tab of the document properties.
